lead_paragraph: AN ARTILLERY OBSERVATION POST, IN EGYPT, Oct. 31 (Delayed) (AP) -- Bayonet-flashing British infantry smashed forward under an earth-jarring barrage last night and in savage hand-to-hand fighting dislodged Germans and Italians from another strong point on the Alamein front.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
